drivers.name: pjxl300
drivers.comments: This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

notes:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Was horribly slow when used with Windows drivers or HPGL/2, went pretty fast with gs.

Consumables/Refills: 4 Crt. CMYK
